body.p:
Morehead Rowan Co
Februay 27th 1861
Hon B. Magoffin
Dear Sir.

Robert Horton Esq of the County of Carter was at the present Term of Rowan Circuit Court fined 50$ under an Indictment charging him with having carried a pistol consealed. The proof showed that a five minutes before the time he was seen with the pistol he borrowed it for the occasion from a friend, he then being in the pressence of a person who as he belived had thetined him with violency of whom he was then apprehensive I am very Sure that this is a proper case for Executive clemency, and therefore recommend and Solicit your Excellency to remit so much of this fine as under the Law. you are authorized to remit
I agree with Mr Andrews in the above statement, which is the substance of the testimony, and think the fine ought to be remitted, and recommend it.

Rowan Cir Ct
Remitted
B. M
$50. } Weapons
Issd Mar 23d 1861
Robt Horton
